requirements.name: Performances
requirements.message: Two solo performances on a St. Olaf Student Recital.

requirements.name: Recital Attendance
requirements.message: You must attend 10 recitals per semester on campus, with a minimum of 60 overall.

requirements.name: Performances
requirements.message: 2 composition performances, at least 1 in junior or senior year

requirements.name: Portfolio
requirements.message: With approval of the composition faculty, the student submits a portfolio of at least 3 compositions previously submitted for Level III composition courses to the Music Office by May 1 of the senior year

requirements.name: Portfolio
requirements.message: With approval of the musicology faculty, the student submits a portfolio of at least 3 papers previously submitted for Level III musicology courses to the Music Office by May 1 of the senior year. One of these must be revised with faculty supervision to demonstrate the student's best work in musiciology

requirements.name: Portfolio
requirements.message: With approval of the theory faculty, the student submits a portfolio of at least 3 papers previously submitted for Level III theory courses to the Music Office by May 1 of the senior year. One of these must be revised with faculty supervision to demonstrate the student's best work in music analysis
